title: Minty Spinach Dip
directions: Cook spinach in a pot of boiling salted water until wilted, about 30 seconds; drain and run under cold water. Drain well, squeeze out as much liquid as possible, and finely chop.
Mix spinach with scallion, sour cream, and mint; season with salt and pepper. Let sit at room temperature at least 15 minutes. Serve with crudités or pita chips.
